snippet: Rather than blame his dismissal on El Mundo’s financial losses, Pedro J. Ramírez accused Spain’s government of engineering retribution for reports on a series of corruption cases.
abstract: Pedro J Ramirez is ousted as editor of El Mundo, conservative newspaper he founded 25 years ago; Ramirez accuses Spain’s government of engineering retribution for reports on series of corruption cases rather than blame his dismissal on paper's financial losses.
lead_paragraph: Rather than blame his dismissal on El Mundo’s financial losses, Pedro J. Ramírez accused Spain’s government of engineering retribution for reports on a series of corruption cases.

headline.main: Founding Editor Is Dismissed as Head of El Mundo
headline.print_headline: Founding Editor Is Dismissed as Head of El Mundo
